description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster or Node CPU / Memory / Disk usage as well as individual pods, containers, systemd services statistics.

list.definition: query_result(topk(10, max_over_time((1 - sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) by (prometheus_from) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (prometheus_from))[${__range_s}s:])))
list.name: top_memory_cluster_id
list.query: query_result(topk(10, max_over_time((1 - sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) by (prometheus_from) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (prometheus_from))[${__range_s}s:])))

list.definition: query_result(topk(10, max_over_time( sum(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[5m])) by (prometheus_from, node, node_id)[${__range_s}s:])))
list.name: top_disk_read_node_id
list.query: query_result(topk(10, max_over_time( sum(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[5m])) by (prometheus_from, node, node_id)[${__range_s}s:])))

title: Rancher Global Monitoring
